html:
6.8.22  4:53 am   how much hours of free time is suboptimal?

      0, for sure

6.8.22  2:53 am   do u enjoy playing chess

      i enjoy setting it up

6.8.22  1:35 am   what is something interesting you have recently changed your mind about?

      what time it is

6.8.22  1:11 am   do you think there is any point in writing songs that you know you're never going to record?

      sure. you may perform it live, but you also don't actually know you won't record it in the future because you could change your mind

6.7.22  11:27 pm   How to conquer all of India

      india is self-conquering. so you can relax and enjoy some free time

6.7.22  9:23 pm   why does the transition into "the best thing about games is losing them" feel like I'm falling down stairs but the stairs feel good?

      that was the only way i could get it back into the starting key

6.7.22  9:19 pm   opinion on despicable me

      not despicable enough

6.7.22  9:12 pm   What inspires you to make the music you do? I mean, It's really it's own thing as far as tone and vibes go, so what enables that creativity?

      just trying to get by

6.7.22  7:56 pm   What genre is your music

      average

6.7.22  7:22 pm   what is the 47th lyric of your new song

      bags

6.7.22  6:44 pm   what's in the fragile box?

      a much stronger, robust box

6.7.22  5:31 pm    what do you like most

      when things change between changing and staying the same

6.7.22  5:28 pm   do you like chocolate?

      it's too good. it makes me angry

6.7.22  5:18 pm   i have a song idea, but the only part i have is absolutely the very end of the song. any tips on figuring out what comes before it?

      no. this is almost impossible. you'll need a miracle

6.7.22  5:09 pm   what should i do with my life

      make some connections.........

6.7.22  4:55 pm   what do you call major chords with an added 4? you seem to use them a lot and i think that's reasonable

      add4. (Cadd4, Dadd4, etc)

6.7.22  4:33 pm   Why if you buy more cheese you get more holes, meaning you get less cheese?

      because you're ignoring the cheese

6.7.22  2:14 pm   is the best thing about games *actually* losing them?

     no, but it's pretty cool

     if so, why?

      well, you probably can't win all the time. so you might as well figure out how to enjoy life anyway

6.7.22  1:46 pm   will you ever make a rock song

      what the heck is a rock song

6.7.22  1:36 pm   Was the console in your most recent music video a NES?

      the console much more closely resembles the SNES, while the controllers are more rectangular like the NES. but it's not supposed to be actually either one

6.7.22  12:46 pm   have you played tennis

      i don't recall

6.7.22  12:11 pm   have you ever felt cool

      almost

6.7.22  12:00 pm   whats your opinion on sticky notes

      the secret ingredient is being not very sticky

6.7.22  11:30 am   how real are ideas

      too real. it's alarming

6.7.22  9:44 am   why is r your favorite letter?

      if it's the most recent one i've seen, it may be fresh in my mind

6.7.22  9:29 am   If you had two rooms,blue and red, which one would you go inside?

      i'd try to set up a split-screen

6.7.22  7:53 am   opinions on horses?

      sometimes i'm amazed at how much power they have

6.7.22  2:20 am   what will happen if the sky burns out?

      there will be a new one

6.6.22  11:08 pm   Hey bill, how do I stop feeling stupid when I try to sing the songs I write for myself?

      maybe if you do 2 other smart things at the same time

6.6.22  10:29 pm   Do you like your music?

      i'm supposed to make it that way. if that's even possible

6.6.22  10:21 pm   what is a saying that's stuck with you 

      fuck

6.6.22  9:42 pm   how to stop thinking about a certain someone all the time

      you'll have to discover someone else....

6.6.22  9:14 pm   Do you plan to make more short animations like "hi i'm steve" or "wild frolicking adventures" again?

      yes

6.6.22  8:43 pm   are you really a huge gamer most of the time like you said in your song

      that's not about me per se

6.6.22  7:37 pm   can you explain parallel compression? thanks!

      make a duplicate of the track and compress the second one all flat to total shit, and play the flat one very quietly in addition to the regular one. almost like bringing the compression in from the bottom instead of flattening the peaks

6.6.22  7:05 pm   How do you write decent-sounding music in irregular time signatures?

      the best way is to write what you want to write, and let it fall in whatever time signatures it falls in. On the other hand, if you have a specific goal to use irregular time signatures, then that's going to give you irregular music because that's the intention you started with

6.6.22  5:27 pm   What is you favorite thing about language?

      surprises

6.6.22  3:59 pm   Do you like music

      it's ok

6.6.22  2:43 pm   Why are triangles so mean

      it's the sharp corners. they have to have at least 2 sharp corners, in order to make it all the way around in only 3 turns

6.6.22  11:30 am   Will you use the vibraslap in a song 

      i recall putting a huge vibraslap just before the first chorus of "long long long journey"

6.6.22  10:07 am   traditional Christmas hymns vs modern Christmas music which is better/your favorite

      a good song can be written or produced at any time. you could even do it right now.... i dare you

6.6.22  8:59 am   what is your favorite letter

      r

6.6.22  3:23 am   i like liking things, there's too many things i find myself liking, and i need a way to narrow down what i like in a way that i like

      how about maybe 1 thing a day. maybe make a tv show about it

6.6.22  12:06 am   Are you proud of what you create when you post it?

      i at least have to convince myself i am, at that moment

6.5.22  11:51 pm   do you think that all art is political?

      no

6.5.22  11:47 pm   hi bill this question seems like it would have been asked before but how do i find my sound as a musician, all your songs have a special tone to them that no other songs have, but i want to write in loads of different styles. do you deal with this issue and if so how

      i just try to make each one as different as possible, and then let everyone else accuse me of doing them all the same

6.5.22  10:13 pm   If something repeatedly and only happens in your dreams, is that a sure sign that it will never happen in real life? 

      no, but there may be other reasons for it to be impossible

6.5.22  8:33 pm   why do i know the lyrics to most of your songs by heart

      it sounds like you may have heard them several times

6.5.22  5:26 pm   Have you ever received a question on here that you were unsure the answer to?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.5.22  3:30 pm   I'm bored, what should I do?

      walk around the world
